scripts.test: cypress run && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:chrome: cypress run --browser chrome && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:firefox: cypress run --browser firefox && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:edge: cypress run --browser edge && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure: cypress run --env allure=true && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.clean: rm -rf allure-results allure-report cypress/screenshots cypress/videos cypress/cucumber-json
